page.title: 04HOUSING IN HAWICK
page.content: Approximately half of all houses in Hawick are privately owned. 1980 1985 private 42% 45% council 58% 55% People now have the opportunity to buy their council houses and in the last four years 220 houses have been purchased . These tend to be the modern or recently modernised buildings and are not restricted to any particular area. The Housing Department are on the whole satisfied with the standard of housing but feel there's always room for improvement. They are making efforts to provide for the needs of both young and elderly single people,and single parent families. They would like to provide at least 50 more units of sheltered housing for the elderly.
